ModMetaData.name: Graphic Chair Overhaul 2
ModMetaData.author: Si-Cafe
ModMetaData.description: Mod that makes your colonists look like they're actually sitting on the chairs! Now supports: -Core -Royalty -Rimkea -Gloomy Furniture -Vanilla Furniture Expanded -Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer Module -and various mods that add chairs!
